tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_pledge_fixed_texts; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_pledge_fixed_texts AS SELECT p.id AS pledge_id, CAST('constant' as varchar(10)) as constant, 'Undefined' AS approval_status, 999999999 AS approval_status_key,
'Undefined' AS amp_id, 'Undefined' AS gov_agreement_number, 'Undefined' AS budget_code_project_id, 'Undefined' as draft, 'Undefined' AS fy, 'Undefined' AS vote, 'Undefined' AS subvote, 'Undefined' AS subprogram, 'Undefined' AS project_code, 'Undefined' AS ministry_code, 'Undefined' AS cris_number, 'Undefined' AS prj_implementation_unit, 'Undefined' AS imac_approved, 'Undefined' AS national_oversight, 'Undefined' AS on_budget, 'Undefined' AS on_parliament, 'Undefined' AS on_treasury, 'Undefined' AS national_financial_management, 'Undefined' AS national_procurement, 'Undefined' AS national_audit, CAST (NULL as int) AS proposed_project_life,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS original_comp_date, 999999999 AS original_comp_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS contracting_date, 999999999 AS contracting_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS disbursments_date, 999999999 AS disbursments_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS proposed_start_date, 999999999 AS proposed_start_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS actual_start_date, 999999999 AS actual_start_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS proposed_approval_date, 999999999 AS proposed_approval_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS actual_approval_date, 999999999 AS actual_approval_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS actual_completion_date, 999999999 AS actual_completion_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS proposed_completion_date, 999999999 AS proposed_completion_date_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS date_created, 999999999 AS date_created_code,
CAST (NULL AS DATE) AS date_updated, 999999999 AS date_updated_code
FROM amp_funding_pledges p;
